about_the_game:
"The Scholars: Fan Jin" is an adventure game mainly based on the plot, where players will play the role of Fan Jin and experience the bitter and varied life of the imperial examination in the mid Ming Dynasty.

There are ten original tracks in "The Scholars: Fan Jin's Chapter Soundtrack" . Unlike the traditional use of traditional Chinese music in ancient style games, this game heavily incorporates film and television composition techniques, with a focus on rendering the environment and inner emotions of characters.
